A woman who hates cats (Alice Krige) and her son (Brian Krause) have moved into a small town, and must deal with a mean cat-loving elderly neighbor, Lucy Caroline Youngblood, who goes out of her way to terrorize the family. Well, turns out Alice has some dark powers herself and one day she gets revenge on Lucy in a very Katharine Peuce-like fashion.
This is an absolutely amazing low-budget film with two outstanding performances by actors
